item.title: Image-to-ASCII
item.description: Usage install PIL: pip install pillow put the images to convert in /data. they’ll be output to /out at size choice, type 0 if no preference to override size limits, type -1 on the output quality dialogue. Examples supports different quality outputs: Motivations A few years ago, I found out about donut.c which was equal parts artistry and wizardry to me. I really liked the look of it, growing up surrounded by ASCII art on obscure forums.
